com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client
Class RhizosphereUserAgent<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.RhizosphereUserAgent<T>

public class RhizosphereUserAgent<T>
extends java.lang.Object

The UserAgent is an high-level interface to programmatically drive a Rhizosphere visualization like a user would do. This allows Rhizosphere visualizations to communicate bidirectionally with any other interacting third party existing in the same GWT application.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)

Method Detail

bindTo

void bindTo(Rhizosphere<T> visualization)
Binds this user agent to the Rhizosphere visualization that spawned it.

Parameters:
visualization - The visualization to bind to.

doSelection

void doSelection(java.lang.String action,
                 java.util.Collection<RhizosphereModelRef> models,
                 RhizosphereCallback cb)
Performs a programmatic selection of visualization models. Different types of operations can be performed. See rhizo.seletion.js for the list of supported operations.

Parameters:
action - The type of operation to perform.
models - The collection of visualization models the operation applies to. Not all operations use this parameter and it can be optionally omitted at times. Refer to the documentation above for details. Use null when unneeded.
cb - An optional callback invoked with the outcome of the selection operation.

doSelection

void doSelection(java.lang.String action,
                 java.util.Collection<RhizosphereModelRef> models,
                 boolean incremental,
                 RhizosphereCallback cb)
Programmatically performs a selection operation on the visualization models. Different types of operations can be performed. See rhizo.seletion.js for the list of supported operations.

Parameters:
action - The type of operation to perform.
models - The collection of visualization models the operation applies to. Not all operations use this parameter and it can be optionally omitted at times. Refer to the documentation above for details. Use null when unneeded.
incremental - Whether the operation should be incremental or not. Relevant only for 'hide' and 'focus' operations.
cb - An optional callback invoked with the outcome of the selection operation.

doFilter

void doFilter(java.lang.String key,
              com.google.gwt.json.client.JSONValue value,
              RhizosphereCallback cb)
Programmatically applies a faceted filter on visualization models on the given model attribute.

Parameters:
key - The name of the Rhizosphere model attribute, as defined by RhizosphereModelAttribute.name(), the filter applies to.
value - The filtering criteria. The specific format of the filtering criteria depends on the attribute kind. For example, attributes with the RANGE kind expect the criteria to be a JSONObject with two numeric min and max entries. Use a null to remove any pre-existing filter on the attribute.
cb - An optional callback invoked with the outcome of the filter operation.

doFilter

void doFilter(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.google.gwt.json.client.JSONValue> filters,
              RhizosphereCallback cb)
Programmatically applies one or more faceted filters on visualization models.

Parameters:
filters - The set of filters to apply. Each key should be a valid Rhizosphere model attribute name, as defined by RhizosphereModelAttribute.name(), for a filter to apply to. Each value should represent the filtering criteria. The specific format of the filtering criteria depends on the attribute kind. For example, attributes with the RANGE kind expect the criteria to be a JSONObject with two numeric min and max entries. Use a null to remove any pre-existing filter on the attribute.
cb - An optional callback invoked with the outcome of the filter operation.

doFilter

void doFilter(com.google.gwt.json.client.JSONObject filterObj,
              RhizosphereCallback cb)
As doFilter(Map, RhizosphereCallback), with the filters defined as a JSONObject instead of a Map.

Parameters:
filterObj - The set of filters to apply.
cb - An optional callback invoked with the outcome of the filter operation.

doResetFilters

void doResetFilters(RhizosphereCallback cb)
Programmatically resets all the filters currently applied to visualization models.

Parameters:
cb - An optional callback invoked with the outcome of the filter operation.

doLayout

void doLayout(java.lang.String engine,
              com.google.gwt.json.client.JSONObject state,
              java.util.Collection<RhizosphereModelPosition> positions,
              RhizosphereCallback cb)
Programmatically changes the layout algorithm to visually arrange visualization models.

Parameters:
engine - The layout engine to use. Must be one the valid engine names as defined in rhizo.layout.js in the rhizo.layout.layouts structure. Use null to re-use the current layout engine.
state - The layout state to use. The state is the set of configuration options that each layout engine accepts to customize its behavior. The state definition is layout-specific. Use null to let the layout use its last (or default) state.
positions - An optional collection of explicit positioning information for visualization models, that will override any position the layout engine would otherwise define. Leave null if unneeded.
cb - An optional callback invoked with the outcome of the layout operation.
